data.name: MariAlbum
data.detailed_description: MariAlbum is a visual novel spinoff of OTUSUN CLUB's flagship title, The Bell Chimes For Gold. Following up on the previous spinoff, A Day In The Life Of Maria, MariAlbum offers a further glimpse of the lives of Maria Scissorland and the men she's gotten involved with. In addition to being available in English for the first time, the game has been remastered for release on Steam and features an all-new soundtrack from accomplished composer Yonao Keishi! If you've played The Bell Chimes For Gold, this is the perfect chance to reunite with Maria and her many suitors.
data.about_the_game: MariAlbum is a visual novel spinoff of OTUSUN CLUB's flagship title, The Bell Chimes For Gold. Following up on the previous spinoff, A Day In The Life Of Maria, MariAlbum offers a further glimpse of the lives of Maria Scissorland and the men she's gotten involved with. In addition to being available in English for the first time, the game has been remastered for release on Steam and features an all-new soundtrack from accomplished composer Yonao Keishi! If you've played The Bell Chimes For Gold, this is the perfect chance to reunite with Maria and her many suitors.
data.short_description: MariAlbum is a visual novel spinoff of OTUSUN CLUB's flagship title, The Bell Chimes For Gold. It offers a further glimpse of the lives of Maria Scissorland and the men she's gotten involved with, and the Steam version is remastered with an all-new soundtrack!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes visual and textual depictions of explicit sexual content involving adult characters, including a scene featuring drugging and dubious consent.
